HotelElement.Name: Comfort Inn & Suites Near Folsom Lake

Description.Text: Location The newly-renovated hotel is an exceptional hotel close to Sacramento and Folsom. Steps from beautiful Lake Natoma, this Spanish-style hotel surrounds a tropical courtyard that offers a serene sanctuary from the hustle of city life. Travellers can enjoy a refreshing blend of modern hospitality and California personality, with all the contemporary luxuries of home and office. Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 118 rooms. In the air-conditioned hotel, travellers are welcomed at the reception area with 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-in/check-out service. A conference room is among the facilities. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Travellers arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the garage or in the car park. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. The carpeted rooms feature a double bed. There is also a safe. A fridge, a microwave and a tea/coffee station ensure a comfortable stay. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. A shower and a bathtub can be found in the bathrooms. A hairdryer is also available. The establishment offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The hotel features a pool and an outdoor pool. The establishment offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the accommodation: VISA and MasterCard.
